name: VoU Dark Green Theme
description: A dark green reverse color scheme (dark background, light text) for Valley of Unicorn's new Peacetime (3.0) core.
additional_info:
If there is anything I've missed or need to correct, let me know and I'll try my best! You can contact me on VoU or Flight Rising (same username)

6/1/18:
+Changed color of stroking/level popup on pet page for readibility
+Changed color of player profile header for readibility
+Changed color of News headline for readibility
